oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Roy Acuff recording session 1951-01-16 - Waltz Of Broken Vows (La Croy Sisters) [issued]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: La Croy Sisters recording of Waltz Of Broken Vows from January 16, 1951 studio session with Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys. Released as Columbia 20839 (b-side).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: La Croy Sisters; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) The La Croy Sisters and the Smoky Mountain Boys perform "Waltz Of Broken Vows"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; La Croy Sisters
